context_2: This plaque was presented to Feng Huang Motion Picture Co. at the South East Asia Cultural Festival that was held in Singapore
physical_appearance: "The image displays a plaque which has a brown border. A drawing of the front of the former Singapore National Theatre can be seen at the centre of the plaque. The year '1963' and 'Singapore' are displayed below the drawing. Within the border of the larger and small circle, the words, ""South East Asia Cultural Festival"" is written between their circumferences. Below the two circular boundaries
creator_1: Feng huang ying ye gong si
subject_terms_1: there is a rectangle containing words in red capital letters inside. It states that the plaque is 'presented to Feng Huang Motion Picture Co...' Some of the colours on the words and images of the plaque have faded away. " commemoratives gift giving festivals honours
